channel.title: MPs’ expenses – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: MPs in black square abuse probe
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: In an unprecedented political development today, it was revealed that almost every MP in the UK has been billing the taxpayer for the purchase of numerous black squares, many of which are believed to have been misused for private business. While members of the public are believed to broadly support the use of black squares Continue reading →
item.p: In an unprecedented political development today, it was revealed that almost every MP in the UK has been billing the taxpayer for the purchase of numerous black squares, many of which are believed to have been misused for private business. While members of the public are believed to broadly support the use of black squares Continue reading →
